rationale: The segment discusses training and access to resources but does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Together the organizations [federal organization and community-based organizations] will provide training and information sessions about bird flu and the organizations [federal organization and community-based organizations] will expand access to testing, treatment and PPE.
